product.title: The Big Bad Wolf and Li’l Wolf | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
The Big Bad Wolf and Li’l Wolf

Young readers will be entranced by this delightful spin on an infamous fairytale villain. Zeke Wolf, the big bad wolf from The Three Little Pigs and Little Red Riding Hood, wants desperately for his son, Li’l Wolf, to follow in his paw prints. However, unlike Zeke, Li’l Wolf is kindhearted and can’t bear the thought of harming others. Much to Zeke’s dismay, Li’l Wolf befriends the Three Little Pigs and protects them from his father’s ravenous appetite.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to list the similarities that you and he share, and help him pinpoint the differences. Encourage him to recognize his own special traits and to embrace his individuality.
